018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.compress.aircompressor;
019
020import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseClassTestRule;
021import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.compress.CompressionTestBase;
022import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testclassification.SmallTests;
023import org.junit.ClassRule;
024import org.junit.Test;
025import org.junit.experimental.categories.Category;
026
027@Category(SmallTests.class)
028public class TestSnappyCodec extends CompressionTestBase {
029
030  @ClassRule
031  public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE =
032    HBaseClassTestRule.forClass(TestSnappyCodec.class);
033
034  @Test
035  public void testSnappyCodecSmall() throws Exception {
036    codecSmallTest(new SnappyCodec());
037  }
038
039  @Test
040  public void testSnappyCodecLarge() throws Exception {
041    codecLargeTest(new SnappyCodec(), 1.1); // poor compressability
042    codecLargeTest(new SnappyCodec(), 2);
043    codecLargeTest(new SnappyCodec(), 10); // very high compressability
044  }
045
046  @Test
047  public void testSnappyCodecVeryLarge() throws Exception {
048    codecVeryLargeTest(new SnappyCodec(), 3); // like text
049  }
050
051}
